oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gutzwiller variational wave function for multi-orbital Hubbard models in finite dimensions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Münster, Kevin zu
Bünemann, Jörg
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Condensed Matter - Strongly Correlated Electrons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We develop a diagrammatic method for the evaluation of general multi-band Gutzwiller wave functions in finite dimensions. Our approach provides a systematic improvement of the widely used Gutzwiller approximation. As a first application we investigate itinerant ferromagnetism and correlation-induced deformations of the Fermi surface for a two-band Hubbard model on a square lattice.
